headline: How Board Expansions and Strategic Hires Could Shape Global Payments' (GPN) Technology-Driven Growth Strategy
summary: Global Payments Inc. recently appointed Patricia Watson and Archana Deskus as independent board directors in agreement with Elliott Investment Management, while Nathan Rozof was named head of Investor Relations to enhance shareholder engagement. These leadership changes highlight a renewed focus on governance, operational transformation, and technology-driven growth as Global Payments advances its strategic initiatives, including the pending Worldpay integration. Next, we’ll consider how the...

headline: Global Payments Appoints Veteran Nathan Rozof as Head of Investor Relations
summary: Global Payments Inc. (NYSE:GPN) is one of the most undervalued stocks to buy and hold for 5 years. On September 30, Global Payments announced the appointment of Nathan Rozof, CFA, as the head of Investor Relations. In this role, Rozof will lead the company’s investor relations strategy, serving as the primary liaison between Global Payments […]
